description: After installing the security update for Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 118.0.2088.46, users may experience performance degradation. This includes noticeable slowdowns when loading web pages, delayed response times during navigation, and potential instability with tabs. This symptom may affect productivity as users navigate and interact with the browser, indicating that the recent security update might impact the browser's efficiency despite addressing underlying vulnerabilities. For further information regarding this update, you can refer to the associated KB Article.
